regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control from datetime import datetime, timedelta import re,requests if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return current_date = datetime.now() date_format = current_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d") page_data = requests.get('https://sportscentral.io/new-api/matches?date=' + date_format, headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://reddit.nbabite.com'}).text r = re.findall('(?s){"id":([^,]*),"l.*?ent":([^\}]*).*?ent":([^\}]*).*?e":"([^"]*).*?e":"([^"]*).*?pe":"([^"]*).*?nk":"([^"]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3],i[4],i[5],i[6]) for i in r if 'inprogress' in i[5]] return sort

regex.name: lists
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = '[makelist.param1]'): from resources.lib.modules import client import re,requests t = requests.get('https://scdn.dev/main-assets/' + url + '/' + 'soccer' + '?origin=sportscentral.io', headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':'https://sportscentral.io'}).text t = t.split('Fubo',1)[-1] z = re.findall('(?s)stream-link="([^"]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)',t) #if 'streamcheck' in z: #sort = [(client.tinyl(i[0]) ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z if 'streamcheck' in i[0]] #return sort #else: sort = [(i[0] ,i[1],i[2]) for i in z] return sort

regex.name: m3u
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import xbmc,xbmcgui pDialog = xbmcgui.DialogProgress() pDialog.create('[B][COLOR orchid]THE CREW SPORTS[/COLOR][/B]', 'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') url = client.external('[lists.param1]') pDialog.update(65,'The Crew Is Loading Your Event Please Wait....') pDialog.close() if (pDialog.iscanceled()): return return url

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import control import re r = re.findall('(?s)btn-secondary\" title = "([^"]*)" href = "([^"]*).+?src="([^"]*)', page_data) return r

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import site,control if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return import re,requests page_data = requests.get('https://livetvon.click/').text page_data = page_data.split('>Soccer<',1)[-1] page_data = page_data.split('>Cricket<',1)[0] e = re.findall('<hr>([^<]*)|href="([^"]*)(?s).*?ner">([^<]*)', page_data) return e

regex.name: crewschedule
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return e = re.findall('(?s)(\w+\:\w+)\s*([^|]*)\|(.*?php)', page_data) sort = [(i[0],i[1],i[2].replace(' ','')) for i in e] return sort

regex.name: play
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = '[crewschedule.param3]'): from resources.lib.modules import jsunpack import re,requests src = re.findall('<iframe src="([^"]*)', page_data)[0] src = 'http:' + src if src.startswith('//') else src fu = requests.get(src, headers={'user-agent':'iPad','referer':url}).text hat = re.findall('eval\(function(.+?m3u8.+)', fu)[0] the = jsunpack.unpack(hat) crew= re.findall('var\s*src="([^"]*)',the)[0] return crew + '|user-agent=ipad&referer=' + url

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return site = client.request('https://dailysport.monster/', headers={'user-agent':'Mozilla/5.0'},verify=False) items = re.findall('(?s)<td>(\d+[^\s]*)\s([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^=]*)="([^"]*)">(?:[^\d+]*)\d*\s*([^<]*)', site) sort = [(i[0],i[1],client.replaceHTMLCodes(i[2]).replace('\xc3\xada',''),'https://dailysport.monster/'+i[3],i[4]) for i in items] return sort

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return s = re.findall('(?s)<button class=.*?>([^<]*).*?href="([^"]*)', page_data) sort = [(i[0].replace('\t',' '),i[1]) for i in s if 'NFL' not in i[0] if 'NBA' not in i[0] if 'UFC' not in i[0] if 'ATP' not in i[0] if 'Cricket' not in i[0] if 'Fight Night' not in i[0]] return sort

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client, cache,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return site = cache.get(client.request, 1, 'https://sports24.icu/soccer.php') items = re.findall('(?s)<div class="card-body">(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)="([^"]*)', site) sort = [(i[0].replace('\xc3\xa9s',''),'https://sports24.icu'+i[1].replace('\xc3\xa9s','')) for i in items] return sort

regex.name: player
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,base64 s = client.request('[makelist.param2]') l = re.findall('(?s)xurl\s=\satob\(\'([^\']*)', s)[0]; l = base64.b64decode(l) l = l.replace('https:','') l = l.replace('//','https://') return l + '|user-agent=ipad&referer=[makelist.param2]'

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return page_data = page_data.split('NBA Live Streams Schedule',1)[-1] r = re.findall('(?s)<a href="([^"]*)(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)="([^"]*)">(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>\s+([^\n]*)', page_data) r = [(i[0],i[1],client.replaceHTMLCodes(i[2]), i[3]) for i in r if 'png' in i[1]] r = [(i[0],i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in r if 'All Games' not in i[2]] return r

title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]ACESTREAM SOCCER/FOOTBALL STREAMS[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] (S2P)[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,urllib if not control.infoLabel('Container.PluginName') == 'plugin.video.thecrew': return request = client.request('http://www.sportp2p.com/live-sport/') reg = re.findall('(?s)class="realtimeh">([^<]*)(?:[^-]*)-([^"]*)(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)="([^"]*)">([^<]*)', request) reg = [i for i in reg if 'advert' not in i[2] and 'AceStream' in str(client.request('http://www.sportp2p.com' + i[2]))] reg = [(client.replaceHTMLCodes(i[0]),client.replaceHTMLCodes(i[1]).upper(),'http://www.sportp2p.com'+i[2],i[3]) for i in reg] reg = [('[COLOR red]WARNING: ACESTREAM LINKS VPN ADVISED - PLEXUS NEEDED[/COLOR]', '', '', '')] + reg return reg

regex.name: makelist2
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re list = client.request('[makelist.param3]') links = re.findall('<(?s)tr>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>\s+([^<]*)(?:[^=]*)=(?:[^=]*)="([^"]*)"><b>([^<]*)(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>(?:[^>]*)>([^<]*)', list) links = [(i[0],'http://www.sportp2p.com'+i[1],i[2],i[3]) for i in links if 'Ace' in i[0]] return links

regex.name: player
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,urllib player = client.request('[makelist2.param2]') findurl = re.findall('content=(?:[^=]*)=([^"]*)', player)[0] u2 = client.request(findurl) find = re.findall('(?:)href="acestream:\/\/([^"]*)', u2)[0] return find

dir.title: [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR] [B][COLOR white]SOCCER/FOOTBALL[/COLOR] [COLOR orchid] LIVE DIRECTS[/COLOR][/B] [COLOR orchid]¤[/COLOR]
